original_title: 超てれびくん 超バトルDVD 超学館特装 仮面ライダーセイバー 集え！ヒーロー‼ 爆誕ドラゴンてれびくん
overview: In this Hyper Battle DVD, Mei wants to write a book for children. But the Megid oppose this idea, forcing Touma to transform into Kamen Rider Saber Dragon TV-Kun to put an end to their evil plan!
tagline: TVKun Wonder Ride Book is Complete!!
title: Kamen Rider Saber: Gather! Hero! The Explosive Dragon TVKun
